dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Jayme Williams [mailto:jayme@netenforcers.com] 
Sent: Thursday, July 13, 2006 11:49 AM
To: Copyright; Andrea Almeida
Subject: 1800nicebuy.com--SONY TV-EV Letterhead ISP Letter Template


DMCA Notification 
________________________________

Phoenix Office:


Ellis & Venable


101 N. First Avenue, Suite 1875


Phoenix, Arizona 85003

voice: (602) 631-9393

fax: (602) 631-9796

 

7/13/2006

 


7006 0810 0005 4495 5677


 

VIA CERTIFIED US MAIL

RETURN RECEIPT REQUESTED

 

The Planet

George Poletes

1333 N Stemmons Fwy Ste 110

Dallas, TX 75207


Re:      Unauthorized Use of SONY TELEVISION'S Trademarks and/or Copyrighted Materials

 

Dear Designated Agent:

 

We have been retained by our Sony Television, Net Enforcers, Inc., to contact you
with respect to unauthorized use of Sony's trademarks and/or copyrighted materials. 


 

SONY TELEVISION has retained Net Enforcers to assist with the protection and
enforcement of its rights in SONY TELEVISION-owned or licensed trademarks, logos,
and other copyrighted materials.  Net Enforcers has in turn retained us to assist
with this matter.  Pursuant to 17 U.S.C.
